post:
Hello,

--- Linux Xen VPS in Russia, Moscow - 512MB RAM + 10GB HDD
5 USD/month or $14/quarterly.

--- Linux VPS in Germany, Frankfurt - 512MB RAM + **50**GB HDD (good for backups/storage).
IPv6 Available!
5 USD/month or $14/quarterly. 
[Link to order](https://crm.nqhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=102)

--- **Windows** VPS in Germany, Russia or USA- 512MB RAM + 20GB HDD
7 USD/month or $19/quarterly. 
[Link to order](https://crm.nqhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=109)


What we offer: Bandwidth Transfer - Unmetered Transfer / Port Speed - 100Mbit shared port / vCPU(s) - 2 CPU (~2.4-3.30 Ghz) / IPv4 & IPv6 - One IPv4 address / Virtualization Type/Platform - Xen / Virtualization Control Panel - SolusVM

Payment Methods - Credit cards, PayPal, Skrill (moneybookers), WebMoney, Yandex.Money
